docs.abstract: If you find that Microsoft Office programs have grabbed the wrong name to use for your document comments, you can correct the record.
docs.snippet: If you find that Microsoft Office programs have grabbed the wrong name to use for your document comments, you can correct the record.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. To activate Microsoft Word on my new laptop, I had to open a Microsoft account, but I didn’t use my real name. Now, when I edit a document in Word and add a comment, it lists the note under that made-up name. Any way I can get it to switch back to my real name?

headline.main: Getting Microsoft Word to Call You by Your Real Name

docs.abstract: Microsoft is building gliders that adapt to surprises. The goal is to teach autonomous vehicles of all sorts to deal with uncertainty the way humans do.
docs.snippet: Microsoft is building gliders that adapt to surprises. The goal is to teach autonomous vehicles of all sorts to deal with uncertainty the way humans do.
docs.lead_paragraph: HAWTHORNE, Nev. — As the glider turned and flew south, four men gave chase in a sport utility vehicle below, rolling through the Nevada desert.

headline.main: Microsoft Teaches Autonomous Gliders to Make Decisions on the Fly
headline.print_headline: Learning to Make Decisions on the Fly

docs.abstract: The move could help spur more companies to abandon the billable hour method of charging for legal services.
docs.snippet: The move could help spur more companies to abandon the billable hour method of charging for legal services.
docs.lead_paragraph: Companies have long chafed at law firms’ practice of billing by the hour.

headline.main: Microsoft Shifts From Paying Outside Lawyers by the Hour
headline.print_headline: Microsoft  Shifts Tack On Paying Legal Fees

docs.abstract: The fall season traditionally brings new fashion, movies and books, and Microsoft has fresh software on the way, too.
docs.snippet: The fall season traditionally brings new fashion, movies and books, and Microsoft has fresh software on the way, too.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. With all the concern about Microsoft Paint going away in the next Windows 10 update, I almost missed that there’s yet another update to Windows 10 coming out this year. When is this one supposed to arrive, and what will it do?

headline.main: Gearing Up for Another Windows 10 Update

docs.abstract: If you have Microsoft Word fixing text just the way you like it, you can take your personal correction collection with you to a different computer.
docs.snippet: If you have Microsoft Word fixing text just the way you like it, you can take your personal correction collection with you to a different computer.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I have years of personal AutoCorrect data entries I have made for Microsoft Word. Is it possible to transfer these settings to another computer running Word?

headline.main: Taking Your AutoCorrect Entries With You

docs.abstract: In an unusual partnership, Amazon and Microsoft are working together to extend the abilities of their voice-controlled digital assistants.
docs.snippet: In an unusual partnership, Amazon and Microsoft are working together to extend the abilities of their voice-controlled digital assistants.
docs.lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — The crowded pack of voice-controlled digital assistants — Apple’s Siri, Google Assistant, Amazon’s Alexa and Microsoft’s Cortana — are good at numerous things. They can help people play music, set up calendar appointments and check the weather.

headline.main: ‘Cortana, Open Alexa,’ Amazon Says. And Microsoft Agrees.

docs.abstract: Microsoft is building an autonomous glider guided by artificial intelligence, part of an effort to help machines make decisions when faced with uncertainty.
docs.snippet: Microsoft is building an autonomous glider guided by artificial intelligence, part of an effort to help machines make decisions when faced with uncertainty.
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft is building an autonomous glider guided by artificial intelligence, part of an effort to help machines make decisions when faced with uncertainty.

headline.main: Can Artificial Intelligence Fly a Plane?

byline.original: By CADE METZ, JEAN YVES CHAINON and JOSHUA THOMAS
